MARY BRENNAN v. TOWN OF FAIRFIELD The Supreme Court docket number is SC 16342. Brenden P. Leydon, in support of the petition. Charles W. Fleischmann, in opposition. Decided July 6, 2000

KATZ, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
